summary: When the kids of a young widow inadvertently send an SOS while playing with their uncle Cy's Navy Signal Lamp, the Navy sends their top man to investigate and he falls for their mother.
cast: Shirley Jones|Gig Young|Red Buttons|Carolyn Jones|Edgar Buchanan|Eddie Applegate|Edward Platt|Bill Mumy|Bryan Russell|Robert Foulk|Milton Frome|Peter Robbins|Brian Avery|Tol Avery|Danny Borzage|John Brennan|John Burnside|Boyd Cabeen|Gene Coogan|Bill Couch|Ken Delo|Dennis Durney|Michael Galloway|Jack Grinnage|Barnaby Hale|George Holmes|Hap Holmwood|Loren Janes|Ken Kane|Ron Nyman|Paul Power|Jean Ransome|Ralph Reed|Mitchell Rhein|Ronnie Rondell Jr.|Clifford Sales|James W. Standridge|Norman Stevans|Ken Wales|Bill Welsh|Frank Wilcox|John Willis
title: A Ticklish Affair
